00304 #if defined(AT86RF212) || defined(CUSTOMRF3)
00305 /* Channel number range
00306   Page 0 (BPSK modulation is used and supported IEEE 802.15.4 2003/2006 )
00307     channel  0: 868 MHz      | 20 Kbit/sec
00308     channels 1 - 10: 915 MHz | 40 Kbit/sec
00309   Page 2 (O-QPSK modulation is used and supported IEEE 802.15.4 2006)
00310     channel  0: 868 MHz      | 100 Kbit/sec
00311     channels 1 - 10: 915 MHz | 250 Kbit/sec
00312 
00313   BOOST mode is enabled automatically only for 11, 10, 9, 8, 7, 6 dBm. All other power values do not use BOOST mode.
00314 */
00316
